briefTitle: Cardiotoxicity in Metastatic Her 2 Positive Patients Treated With Trastuzumab ,Pertuzumab and Taxanes
officialTitle: Cardiotoxicity in Metastatic Her 2 Positive Patients Treated With First Line Trastuzumab, Pertuzumab and Taxanes Based Regimen
conditions: Cardiotoxicity., Anti Her2 Therapy., Metastatic Breast Cancer
primaryOutcomeMeasure: To assesses blood levels of TNI and BNP during the first four cycles Trastuzumab&Pertuzumab and Taxanes treatment
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Metastatic Breast Cancer patients with Her2 Positive Disease.
* No prior treatment

Exclusion Criteria:

* LEVF less than 50%
